bio: TODAY is GIVING TUESDAY! Please check my stories along with @isfofficial to help make my mission to make the world a better place a reality.Click 👇

list.comment: Impassioned discussions at our fundraiser last night celebrating 5 years of @isfofficial aka The Ian Somerhalder Foundation working alongside this truly powerful organization @connecther which uses filmmaking as a tool to go beyond storytelling and step into activism. The IS Green award we give every year enables these young women to build upon these stories and create actionable change in their communities. Thank you to all of our incredible donors who came to spend the evening with us last night and for supporting our collective mission. And to the beautiful @thechaispotnyc for hosting us and reminding us to slow down over a cup of chai, connecting with one another in this beautiful space you’ve created. Thanks honey aka @nikkireed for snapping this photo for me to use ;)

Do you miss The Vampire Diaries? I have a gift that has special memories to me for one lucky winner -
one of my personal chair back covers from a season of TVD. Will it be from Season 8? 7? Or even one of
the first seasons? It was my personalized chair cover for an entire season and I want to give it to you.
Buy your ticket to my Meet & Greet at @catconworldwide here bit.ly/CatConISF or click the link in
my bio and I will pick one winner in the next 24 hours. I'll be doing exclusive one on one meet and
greets Sunday, August 5th, from 10:45AM - 1:45PM. You must also have a general admission ticket to CatCon
to attend Meet & Greets.
Don’t forget the most important part is that your attendance at the show will help us further our efforts
with @isfofficial and help animals in need. 50% of ticket price raised from these Meet and Greets will
benefit the Ian Somerhalder Foundation. $2 of every ticket purchased to CatCon ALSO benefits ISF!
Come see me at the show!
#catcon
#isf

My quiet garage alone time with the new scripts in my wooden capsule of healing heat, light and sound. I haven’t broken down another character in 9 years... it’s very special. Very fun. I’ve come up with many ideas in here for ISF, Vampire Diaries, my businesses and my family. This thing has change my life and I’m so grateful that my dear friends at @sunlightensaunas have created such special healing equipment to make our lives and our health better. If you have any doubt of the incredible healing properties of these infrared saunas just check out what they do. It’s not just the heat but the light therapy and the sound resonance therapy. Mind blowing... They are helping people feel better and therefore act better to the world that surrounds them and that is such a cool thing.

Cat lovers, myself included, want the best for their feline family members. I was shocked to learn more than half of all cats don’t see the vet on a regular basis. Let’s change that! I’ve teamed up with @RoyalCaninUS for #Cat2VetDay to raise awareness about the importance of preventive veterinary care for cats. For the rest of this month, repost the video shared on @RoyalCaninUS on August 1 using #Cat2VetDay and Royal Canin will make a donation to help cats in need.
#kittensofinstagram #royalcaninkittens #funwithcats #catsofinstagram #cat #kitten #catstagram #catsofinsta #catlover #ilovemycat

A rainy New York City smooch. Watching this human shine at fashion week was amazing. Congrats on your company being chosen by @fastcompany as one of the great design innovators in sustainability in 2018. You started @bayouwithlove just over a year ago and look how far you’ve come. This collaboration you’ve put together with @dell Is another example of how your creativity shines. Being recognized in this space is nothing short of incredible, as are you. Such. A. Proud. Husband. Nuff said.
Love, Your man

Howdy. Crazy morning Sunday hair, typos and all... I’m a tired papa;) BUT I’m asking you if you can TODAY or RIGHT NOW please add The Ian Somerhalder Foundation to your Amazon Smile for this season and keep it there for all seasons!It’s one of the best birthday presents you could possibly give me. I’m asking you to help me, it doesn’t take long or cost your a penny. It WILL however make my dreams of making our world better. CLICK THE LINK IN MY BIO OR
Type in :
smile.amazon.com/ch/27-3968460 YOU’RE making many of my days great by doing this and I’m so very thankful. Please pass this along to your friends and family! Love,
Ian

That’s a wrap on #VWars! Me as @drlutherswannofficial I’m so humbled by the complex abilities of the cast, crew and Producers/Network/Studio of this show. We did it. It’s in the can as they say... Now it’s time for us, as producers to bring it to life in the editing room and digital effects suite. Thank you @netflix and @idwpublishing for this incredible opportunity. We poured our hearts into this. All you have to do as an audience; is watch. Even if you don’t like it ;) I’d like another crack at a SEASON 2. There are so many places to take this story I want another shot. Let me get into the details with our amazing team to make this a hit show; but I’m going to need you to check it out to see if you jive with it. It’s so very relevant to this modern, social, digital, political and emotional landscape that we all find ourselves all navigating and traversing together. To my team: thank you all for your tireless efforts and talent. I’m humbled to lead the charge of this show into the public sphere. Every second of post production and every interview you will be there with me- the work of many hot Sudbury days to freezing Toronto nights. To our audience: I hope we can move you with grounded, nuanced performances and story with the time allotted for us to tell it. We tried. We will keep trying if you can give us the chance. There is an immense amount of TV out there- we hope you our frequency resonates with you.
With immense gratitude to this group and to our audience,
Ian. Here some important handles to follow for more info: @drlutherswannofficial aka Dr. Luther Swann (me). #vwars @vwarsnetflix @vwars @vwarsofficial

This my I’m sorry I’m late face ... Coming to you @wizardworld Chicago! Weather is to blame!!! Pls thank the amazing @wheelsup8760 team for making this happen!! I’m zipping in and zipping our! Up! Up! Up! #wheelsup8760

Bye bye NYC. Thank you for the immense love from you fans, it’s truly humbling. Wow, I’m not sure how or why I deserve it... I’m catching a nap cuddled with my #vwarsnetflix script in the middle of emails, conference calls and texts for VWars, my soon-to-be-launching wine company, my production company, my nutraceutical company, @gogreenequipment and a global communication technology company- strategizing it all from my office in the sky- on the amazing @wheelsup8760 #KingAir350i made by my friends at @textronaviation . I’m so grateful to the @beechcraft family of engineers for designing the safest, most efficient and greenest turboprop in the world. The KingAir was green, before green was cool. That’s why so many use it. It’s American engineering at its finest and I’m proud that my partners and companies only use @wheelsup8760 & @textronaviation home to @beechcraft & @cessnacitation . Thank to all for keeping me safe and thank you #wheelsup8760 for giving us access to so many of these amazing planes with your combined reliability and safety. When I was a little boy on a bayou in Louisiana, I could have only dreamed of being this busy, this blessed and being surrounded by this much love and ingenuity in the most pivotal time in human history. Hard work, integrity, innovation and compassion is what I’m striving for. I’m trying so very hard to build successful and sustainable for-profit companies to then be able to reinvest those resources back into education to build stronger communities and build a better world for us all and our children... The future of business MUST have a triple bottom line: People. Planet. Profit.
With immense gratitude to you all,
Ian
#textronaviation #upthewayyoufly #wheelsup8760 #kingairnation #kingair350i

the love of an animal is precious... the love of anything is precious... love itself is precious spread it and the world will get better love is better that money love is better than things just being around a creature, any creature that was tossed out, abused or left for dead and then saved knows nothing but love Thank you for a magical day @boochaces on your magical paradise of a rescue farm thank you my beautiful wife @nikkireed for snapping this awesome photo of me and this kiddo

Being a dad- it’s the best role I’ve ever gotten to play. The only one I’ve ever been good at... Happy late(ish) Father’s Day dads. I hope we can all remember that society is a direct reflection of our parenting. So, whatever we can do to step it up and really double down by investing in our kids, teaching them and being present with them; our world will be truly better. I know it’s hard out there but we can do this-I’m proud to one of you now...
Wow. It’s innovation like THIS that is needed.
The fuc$&@“ kills me too @prideofgypsies . We CAN AND MUST DO BETTER. Come on everyone. Please

Just found this: A season wrap on the Vampire Diaries, maybe Season 3,4or 5 I’m not sure. I took this in the mirror of Damon’s dressing room to remember how worn down I was but smiling- That’s a nebulizer I’m sucking on-shooting pharmaceutical hydrogen peroxide into my lungs to keep from collapsing from an infection. Supplements, oxygen chambers flying around like a maniac making a TV show and trying to build companies while building @isfofficial . Be careful. Ambition can be dangerous... I’ve found this image and wanted to share it. We’ve lost amazing men and women recently who really helped change the world but their bodies perished from the pressure and abuse of running too hard and not taking care of themselves. I’m humbly searching for that balance and I wish you all luck in finding it. Meditation helps, I use transcendental mediation or TM- it’s super easy. Just remember this- we don’t actually need much to live happy lives. We, as humans firmly believe more and more and more and more “things” will make us happy. Unfortunately they don’t make us happy. Our buying patterns just fuels economies ... Our kids deserve to grow up not seeing us staring at these little glowing devices in our hands. I hide around corners and under pillows so my little one doesn’t see it... Our babies need us present to teach them and to listen to them. It’s the only way to build a loving and sustainable society. At least that’s what I think- take it or leave it;)

Happy Halloween y’all.. I’m buried in #VWars post production and won’t be on the streets tonight! However, to those of you who are: PLEASE be kind. PLEASE be safe. PLEASE be aware that parents are out with their little ones. PLEASE.

#Repost @theoceancleanup with @get_repost

#comiccon Memories with this amazing human... I can’t wait to be back at @comic_con next year with #vwars @drlutherswannofficial and & @netflix SEE YOU IN 12 MONTHS!
Me and this girl... no filter. Warm Georgia days... Thanks for snapping this photo @nikkireed my love.

Do you want to take a photo with me for my Instagram story? I am so excited to be joining @catconworldwide on the ground for the second year in a row! This time I'll be doing exclusive one on one meet and greets Sunday August 5th, from 10:45 - 1:45PM. TODAY/TOMORROW ONLY, I’m doing a special contest for you.  In the next 24 hours, if you buy a Meet & Greet ticket with me, I’m going to choose one winner to take a photo with me at CatCon to post to my IG story for 24 hours! We can smile, we can be goofy, we can even smolder...Who’s going to win? Get your ticket here bit.ly/CatConISF or click on the link in my bio.
Don’t forget the most important part is that your attendance at the show will help us further our efforts with @isfofficial and help animals in need. 50% of ticket price raised from these Meet and Greets will benefit the Ian Somerhalder Foundation. $2 of every ticket purchased to CatCon ALSO benefits ISF!
Come see me at the show!
#catcon
#isf

I’ve literally given the shirt off of my back for GIVING TUESDAY! TODAY is Giving Tuesday lovely people! Help me celebrate the global day of giving along with 8 years of the Ian Somerhalder Foundation (and my 40th birthday!) Donate NOW by checking my stories, clicking the link in my bio OR going to ISF’s fundraiser at https://www.facebook.com/donate/306521206858996/. Facebook and PayPal are MATCHING donations on Facebook for a total of up to $7 million dollars! That means if you donate $50, it counts as $100 until they hit $7 million! ISF depends on your support to continue to provide education and programs in support of Creatures, the Environment and Youth. Please consider donating today.

Tune in all day for an impactful look back at the past 8 amazing years, made possible because of supporters like you. Every dollar counts, so please join us as we celebrate the amazing grants, programs and events that were made possible because of supporters like you.
The Ian Somerhalder Foundation (ISF) works to empower, educate and collaborate with people and projects to positively impact the planet and its creatures.
ISF delivers unique programs and services and provides public outreach, education, and grants in support of Creatures, Environment, Youth, and Grassroots initiatives.

Much love & gratitude,
Ian Somerhalder
Here he is... @drlutherswannofficial aka Dr. Luther Swann. Would you trust this man? #vwars @vwarsnetflix @vwars @vwarsofficial

Happy late Birthday my big brother @controllingchaos OR @proesportsagent aka JMo. Almost 20 years you and I have been running wild in this crazy entertainment business together. You've taught me so much about business and life my brother; I am grateful. You're now the fuc#%^* Jerry McGuire of eSports and it's amazing to see you in action. I didn't even know what eSports was but I surely do now. I'm so proud to call you my brother, I congratulate you on trailblazing in new industries and wish I could have spent such a special day with you.
Love,
Ian

Wow, times flies. TVD hair/makeup chair just about to be snipped, shaved and “refined” back to Damon Salvatore. Day before shooting season 7 of The Vampire Diaries. Every season I would take a “self portrait” to document the change in who I was after a summer of literally flying around the world meeting so many of you while experiencing this incredible journey ... So much has changed since then. So much growth, so much experience and pushing myself to do more- I truly look forward to sharing these new things I’ve been building: Wine, nutraceuticals, new TV and ISF @isfofficial Thank you all for so much support. Thank you so very much.
All the love and thanks in the world to you,
Ian

Some one was helping me pick out a wig for #VWars I haven’t really begun posting on @drlutherswannofficial - I’ve just been focused on the work. But I will soon, so please follow it and I’ll get stared 🔜🤩 See you at #comiccon next year

Me and this @wheelsup8760 #KingAir350i sky baby/workhorse. My “air” office and the greenest and most efficient plane in the sky. When I was a little boy flying in my uncle’s Cessna I found my love of flying and my love of the sky. I always dreamed of flying around the world and now for my work, I live in the sky. Some are short flights and some long, but they are a great many in number. Mostly to see you all! I’m shooting #VWars right now and I’m so bummed that I missed hanging this week in Florida with my @wheelsup8760 and my @textronaviation family at the #nbaa18 (National Business Aviation Association) @nbaaphotos this year- I WILL make it next year. I can’t wait to see the innovation and artistry of these amazing machines. We have a hard and long road to push in the sustainability realm of aviation both on the business and commercial sides. Revolutionizing efficiency and fuels is the way of the future... it’s a MUST for our planet. I live on this thing so me and my team feel so safe and grateful to @textronaviation for building them and @wheelsup8760 for having such a huge fleet of them- giving us access to move around safely and efficiently.

Hellllloooooo!I’m so excited to announce that I’ve teamed up with OMAZE again to offer YOU the chance to come hang with me on the set of V-Wars! We’ll grab lunch, take photos and you’ll even get a peek of the show being filmed. It’s all to support ISF, so ENTER for your chance to win through my bio link or at omaze.com/ian Let’s do this!!!!!!!
With immense gratitude,
Ian

What’s up CHICAGO I’m on the ground!!! @wizardworld here I come! Sorry for the wait!!! Thank you so much to my partners @wheelsup8760 for your safe, beautiful and extremely fast method of getting me to my fans. Flew fast, now driving fast! See you in a bit 🛩🚙

I’ll never forget the feeling of helplessness watching our communities here in California burn. I’m grateful that these destructive flames have stopped due to the hard work and risk of the men and women who fought them from the land and from the air. To our FIREFIGHTERS: We are so grateful for you today and everyday. We love and respect you immensely. To all of our Police and other the 1st responders, emergency professionals and volunteers that went in to save people, homes and animals we thank you from the deepest depths of our hearts. We thank each and every one of you to the stars and back. The @losangelesfiredepartment , you are among the greatest heroes on this planet and your bravery and commitment to protecting our state, our people and our creatures is so powerful and so appreciated. Thank you @lafdfoundation for supporting them. From my family to yours, we thank you all on this day. We can only hope that all those affected by natural disasters this year and in recent years find some happiness and a hug today. Hope is all we have to move forward in these terrible moments but together as community we are strong and can share smiles. I send you all love today and applaud your strength and courage to press on. May we start to talk more seriously about where the increasing number of violent hurricanes and fires, that are destroying our homes and communities are coming from and together pave a road to a more peaceful and less destructive future.
Happy Thanksgiving to all and may today not be about gluttonous consumption but gratitude for the simple things in life, the things that we need to survive: Family, friends and food.
With immense gratitude,
Ian Somerhalder

This is happening. #VWars is happening. I am Dr. Luther Swann at your service... more information to come so follow @drlutherswannofficial (me) & @vwarsofficial to find out more and get special content. Thank you @netflix It’s happening. I’ll be watching your follows and I’ll be posting so don’t let me down. Let’s do this. They are hunting us...
